# Lantern of Revealing
## Overview
**Aura** faint evocation; **CL** 5th

**Slot** â€”

**Price** 30,000 gp

**Weight** 2 lbs.

**Description**

This lantern operates as a normal hooded lantern. While it is lit, it also reveals all invisible creatures and objects within 25 feet of it, just like the spell *[[Invisibility Purge (Spell)|invisibility purge]]*.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Invisibility Purge (Spell)|invisibility purge]]*

**Cost** 15,000 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 522
